title: #117 Gas Stations
itunes:title: #117 Gas Stations
description:
This week, Nate's back from Phoenix so the guys get an update on his new comedy special. Then they delve into the important topic of gas stations. Nate, Aaron, Dusty, and Breakfast debate gas station etiquette, pumping procedures, and the most popular items to buy at a convenience store.

 

 

Podcast produced by Nate & Laura Bargatze

Recording & Editing by Genovations Media

https://www.natebargatze.com

https://www.allthingscomedy.com

https://www.genovationsmedia.com

Email - Nateland@NateBargatze.com

● Don’t forget to enter promo code NATE at sign up for an instant deposit match up to $100 dollars!
